timeline.message: feat: Introduced second implementation for gomod replace
fix: Accounted for unusual component versions
feat: Added third implementation for replacement data extractor
feat: Added catches for JsonSyntaxExceptions from gson
fix: Adjusted test to account for change to extractor B

timeline.bodyText:
I prefer replacementDataExtractorC but he should return the replacement map (and not be passed a shared map).
Map<String, String> replacementData = replacementDataExtractorC.extractReplacementData(listUJsonOutput);
timeline.author: taikuukaits

timeline.message: feat: ReplacementDataExtractors now return maps instead of modifying a shared map
